title.rendered: On Air With Ryan Seacrest Sound Bite

content.rendered:
Ok, so THIS WAS SO COOL. Ryan Seacrest has been one of my hosting idols ever since I was 16 years old. To talk to him was such an amazing experience!! Listen to the interview below as I talk about ways to stay healthy in college, my mom, and other fun stuff:)

Article:

http://news.iheart.com/onair/ryan-seacrest-52241/usc-senior-explains-how-her-ebook-13886561/
